TopicTitle: Building collision glitch on KSC approach.

Articles.Content: This has happened to me once before, but now it's happening almost every time. Upon approach to KSC, at any distance from far away to just over the runway, parts of my plane will "collide" with distant buildings, destroying the parts and sometimes the buildings. It happened 3 or 4 times while landing a spaceplane just now (luckily had a quicksave), and eventually I gave up and put it down in the grass.
Weiiiiiird. Well, what mods are you using, version of KSP, log files, etc. Otherwise, nobody can help you.

Doubt it's related to any mods, only posted here because I have them installed.

Version: .25

Non-UI Mods:

Deadly Re-Entry

NEAR
